scripts.dev: npm install && npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.remote-start: vagrant ssh -c 'node /vagrant/node_modules/forever/bin/forever start -a -l forever.log -o out.log -e err.log /vagrant/src/server.js' -- -n -T
scripts.deploy: npm run remote-up && npm run remote-start && npm run remote-test
scripts.deploy-todo: npm shrinkwrap && package src as tgz && extract remote (gulp?) && npm install from shrinkwrap without devDependencies
scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run coveralls
scripts.coveralls: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec --recursive && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
